ctu.nengoros.nodes

Class CommunicationAwareNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ros.node.AbstractNodeMain
      • ctu.nengoros.nodes.CommunicationAwareNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.ros.node.NodeListener, org.ros.node.NodeMain

    public abstract class CommunicationAwareNode
extends org.ros.node.AbstractNodeMain
    This is a template for ROS node testers. Subclass this in order to create node which is aware of TopicParticipants (publishers/subscribers). It can wait for all topic participants to be registered / connected @see TopicParticipants.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected TopicParticipants participants
      Add here all publishers/subscribers you want to check.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommunicationAwareNode() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void awaitCommunicationReady()
      Wait for the node to be ready (has to call nodeIsPrepared and all TopicParticipants have to be registered with the master).
      boolean communicationReady() 
      boolean isNodePrepared() 
      void nodeIsPrepared()
      This is to be called after successful setup in onStart() method.

    • Field Detail

      • participants

        protected TopicParticipants participants
        Add here all publishers/subscribers you want to check. Add subclasses of TopicParticipant if you want to check whether the participant is registered with ROS master. Add subclasses of ConnectedTopicParticipant if you want to check whether the participant is connected also somewhere in the ROS network.

      • CommunicationAwareNode

        public CommunicationAwareNode()

    • Method Detail

      • awaitCommunicationReady

        public void awaitCommunicationReady()
        Wait for the node to be ready (has to call nodeIsPrepared and all TopicParticipants have to be registered with the master).

      • communicationReady

        public boolean communicationReady()

      • nodeIsPrepared

        public void nodeIsPrepared()
        This is to be called after successful setup in onStart() method. It indicates that the node is ready (e.g. all TopicParticipants are added).

      • isNodePrepared

        public boolean isNodePrepared()
